trans-unit.source: Monitor usage and statistics in an Azure Search service
trans-unit.target: Monitor usage and statistics in an Azure Search service

trans-unit.source: Track resource consumption and index size for Azure Search
trans-unit.target: Track resource consumption and index size for Azure Search

trans-unit.source: Monitor usage and statistics in an Azure Search service
trans-unit.target: Monitor usage and statistics in an Azure Search service

trans-unit.source: Tracking the growth of indexes and document size can help you proactively adjust capacity before hitting the upper limit you've established for your service.
trans-unit.target: Tracking the growth of indexes and document size can help you proactively adjust capacity before hitting the upper limit you've established for your service.

trans-unit.source: To monitor resource usage, counts and statistics are easily viewed in the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com), but you can also obtain the information programmatically if you are building a custom service administration tool.
trans-unit.target: To monitor resource usage, counts and statistics are easily viewed in the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com), but you can also obtain the information programmatically if you are building a custom service administration tool.

trans-unit.source: This article covers the steps for both techniques.
trans-unit.target: This article covers the steps for both techniques.

trans-unit.source: View counts and metrics in the portal
trans-unit.target: View counts and metrics in the portal

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com).
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com).

trans-unit.source: Open the service dashboard of your Azure Search service.
trans-unit.target: Open the service dashboard of your Azure Search service.

trans-unit.source: Tiles for the service can be found on the Home page, or you can browse to the service from Browse on the JumpBar.
trans-unit.target: Tiles for the service can be found on the Home page, or you can browse to the service from Browse on the JumpBar.

trans-unit.source: See [Create a service](search-create-service-portal.md) for step-by-step instructions.
trans-unit.target: See [Create a service](search-create-service-portal.md) for step-by-step instructions.

trans-unit.source: The Usage section includes a meter that tells you what portion of available resources are currently in use.
trans-unit.target: The Usage section includes a meter that tells you what portion of available resources are currently in use.

trans-unit.source: Recall that the shared service has a maximum of one replica and partition each.
trans-unit.target: Recall that the shared service has a maximum of one replica and partition each.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, it can only support 10,000 documents in total or 50 MB of data, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, it can only support 10,000 documents in total or 50 MB of data, whichever comes first.

trans-unit.source: Get index statistics using the REST API
trans-unit.target: Get index statistics using the REST API

trans-unit.source: Both the Azure Search REST API and the .NET SDK provide programmatic access to service metrics.
trans-unit.target: Both the Azure Search REST API and the .NET SDK provide programmatic access to service metrics.

trans-unit.source: If you are using [indexers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn946891.aspx) to load an index from Azure SQL Database or DocumentDB, an additional API is available to get the numbers you require.
trans-unit.target: If you are using [indexers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn946891.aspx) to load an index from Azure SQL Database or DocumentDB, an additional API is available to get the numbers you require.

trans-unit.source: Get Index Statistics
trans-unit.target: Get Index Statistics

trans-unit.source: Count Documents
trans-unit.target: Count Documents

trans-unit.source: Get Indexer Status
trans-unit.target: Get Indexer Status

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Review [Limits and capacity](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn798934.aspx) to determine the combination of partitions and replicas you'll need if existing capacity is insufficient.
trans-unit.target: Review [Limits and capacity](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn798934.aspx) to determine the combination of partitions and replicas you'll need if existing capacity is insufficient.

trans-unit.source: Visit [Manage your Search service on Microsoft Azure](search-manage.md) for more information on service administration.
trans-unit.target: Visit [Manage your Search service on Microsoft Azure](search-manage.md) for more information on service administration.
